message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I understand you're looking for a fair price, but I have to consider the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $850000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $800000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?
